recieveData

public void recieveData(java.lang.String data)
The function checks if the csv is correct and splits the csv string into a float array, which is passed to dataHandler. format of the data output is: accel x, accel y, accel z, revolutions per minute, wheel turn value, time since last data received, distance traveled since last data received,

Parameters:
data - csv string received from bluetooth (x,y,z,speed,turn)
